name: Kent Kendo Club
description: A website for the Kent Kendo martial arts club that was created as a central location to provide information about kendo and the club to new and existing students.

name: Federal Way Kendo Club
description: A website for the Federal Way Kendo martial arts club that was created as a central location to provide information about kendo and the club to new and existing students.

name: Pacific Northwest Kendo Federation
description: Website for the local Pacific Northwest Kendo federation. Currently learning how to use the existing technologies and how to redesign the website to be more modern.

name: What The Shmup
description: A shoot 'em up set in the future. Progress through three levels and collect power ups along the way to help on your journey. Acted as project lead, created sprites, levels, and did level balancing.

name: LyricalLetho
description: Project 1 of the UW web dev bootcamp. Search lyrics, artists, or songs and get the most relevant results using set of APIs.
